title: Games - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 11/9/20
itunes:title: Games - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 11/9/20
description:
George Noory and professor John Gastil explore his work on the exploding popularity of fantasy role playing games like Dungeons and Dragons, the new technology creating immersive worlds in video games, and why players feel such a strong sense of community with each other.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

itunes:summary: A discussion on the growing popularity of board games and video games.
